title: BBC Strictly pair tease joint Celebrity Traitors plans as they pay tribute to Claudia Winkleman: 'We would love to!'
tags: announcing they'd be leaving the show after the 2025 series;Jowita Przystal shares 'dream' BBC Strictly partner as she addresses future on dance competition;Carlos Gu shares 'dream' new Strictly hosts after Tess Daly and Claudia Winkleman exits: 'Be good!';ITV The Chase star teases potential BBC Celebrity Traitors stint after debut series success;The Chase star Anne Hegerty;Mr Gu also told GB News who he would like to see replacing hosts Ms Winkleman and Ms Daly;The GB News Editorial Charter
